data.question: What is the molecular formula of the complex 2a·2.65CH2Cl2?
What temperature were the crystals mounted on glass fibers for X-ray structure determinations?
Is the space group of complex 3 trigonal?
What is the yield percentage for the synthesis of complex 3?
Does the 31P NMR spectrum of complex 3 in CD2Cl2 at room temperature contain a single peak?
What is the role of pentane in the crystallization process of complex 1a?
data.answer: Pentane is used to precipitate the product as a white powder.

data.question: Are the CF3COO- anions and dichloromethane solvent molecules in complex 3 disordered?
What method was used to account for the anion and solvent electron density in complex 3?
data.answer: The SQUEEZE procedure of the PLATON suite of programs.

data.question: Was the structure of complex 3 solved using direct methods?
What is the crystal system of complex 2b·3acetone?
How many gold atoms are contained in the cations of complex 3?
Is the yield of complex 2a higher than that of complex 3?
What is the absorption correction applied using for data collection?
Does the presence of a single Au10 oligomer in solution of complex 3 discriminate between a single oligomer and an assembly of oligomers?
What is the role of AgO2CCF3 in the synthesis of complex 1a?
data.answer: It is added to the solution of [Au2Cl2{μ-R,S-BINAP)] in THF to proceed with the synthesis.

data.question: Are the hydrogen atoms in the structure determination of complex 3 calculated geometrically?
What is the space group of complex 2a·2.65CH2Cl2?
What solvent is used for the crystallization of complex 2b?
Is the crystal system of complex 3 monoclinic?
What is the role of CH2Cl2 in the synthesis of complex 1a?
data.answer: CH2Cl2 is used to dissolve the product before precipitation with pentane.
